oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Ribbons
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.); Vanderbilt University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gold-colored ribbon noting the celebration of "Vanderbilt Day" at the Tennessee Centennial Exposition on October 11, 1897. The ribbon features a profile image of Commodore Cornelius Vanderbilt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition Collection, 1895-1900
